website_summaries.verdict: The HP LaserJet Pro M1212nf is the company's cheapest monochrome multifunction laser printer. For the money, it earns our recommendation for its Smart Install feature and excellent value.
pros: The HP LaserJet Pro M1212nf is a compact mono laser MFP that boasts a cheap price, a compact design, dead-simple installation, and quick print speeds
cons: To hit its low price, the HP LaserJet Pro M1212nf leaves off a few features, including autoduplexing, Wi-Fi, and a full-size paper tray

customer_reviews.title: Scanner issues
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this machine. The scanner function is terrible. Both software and hardware. Paper feeder works - sometimes. Sometimes it will only take the first sheet sometimes none at all. The scanner function will sometimes scan all of the document. Sometimes it won't. Sometimes the scan will be readable, sometimes it is not. Sometimes it will scan all of the text on a page sometimes it won't. Will scan black on a page but not blue. After all this time you would think that HP could get this right. We are a small business and the scan function is key for us. I guess it deserves one star because it does print.
customer_reviews.author: Router user

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 5 years - then broke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2011 and it just physically broke on us (usb connect in the back completely fell out). A couple things that made it challening: 1) if you printed more than 5 pages, the printer got very steamy and the pages would curl 2) the scanner feeder would pick up more than one page at a time often 3) the software for the scanner would make the scans GIANT (even black and white) so I had to spend a lot of time editing them. Hopefully technology has gotten better since!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great little laser multifunction
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little laser multi-function printer! I have had it for two years now and have never had any problems with it. I don't print stuff all that often, and almost never need color. I have not had to replace the toner. My one complaint is that it does not have a manual feed for envelopes... when I want to print an envelope or smaller piece of paper, I have to take all paper out. My old LaserJet 1012 had a manual feed on top of the main paper tray, I really wish this had that.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Esau

customer_reviews.title: Good so Far
customer_reviews.text: The printer seems to be functioning very well. I don't use it that much but so far it prints quickly and clearly and isn't really all that loud. I did find the written instructions pretty vague and the instructions for scanning were not to be found in the printed directions. Once I found them on the CD which said to find a directory and click an icon, I could not get the printer to scan. By sheer luck I found an oddly named file which I clicked on and that finally launched the scanning application. Scanning is a little on the slow side compared to the Lexmark it replaced. All in all, I'm happy with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: LAGman

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent printer. I have purchased 2 of these over the years for my own use (one at home and one at work) and have had zero issues with them. The toner cartridges are readily available for minimal cost, the print is sharp, copying, printing, and scanning are extremely simple. This printer is also network/wifi adapted and super easy to set up and get to work. I am so impressed with this product that I ordered one for our nursing staff at the medical facility in which I worked. You definitely can't go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Great Laser Mulit-function - can print wirelessly if hooked up to router - Fax & telephone w/ ans machine worked
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great LASER multifunction device( copy, fax, scan, print). Best for home use - not office. Can wireless print to this model if it is hooked up to your router - not your PC (which is how it is supposed to work). Did not have any issues using fax and telephone with answer machine - unlike some other reviewers. Panel is so -so. Buttons are small but useable. For the price, one can't complain. Unfortunately most new models come with starter laser cartridge which isn't like normal or full size one. Regardless you'll save more $$ using laser vs. ink/jet cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Sultry_S3

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous inexpensive laser printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer 2 1/2 years ago and I love it. All of the features -- printing, scanning, copying, faxing -- work first time every time. It's very easy to set up and configure this printer. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is that I have trouble getting the toner cartridges in and out. Fortunately, they don't have to be changed all that often. And admittedly, it may be more user error than design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Judy the Kindle Addict

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Does It All
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with this lightweight, compact design that does it all.... fax, copy, scan, and print. The quality of the product and printing is good. It was easy to set up. I had only minor confusion on learning how ti install the software and use the scanning feature. Copying and printing was easy. My only frustration is that a print cartridge only does 2600 copies. My old printer did 15,000. They don't make them like that anymore. Overall, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Monochrome Laserjet
customer_reviews.text: We've bought a number of HP printers. This one worked well for the short time we had it. We returned it since we thought we were buying a color laserjet. There is nothing on the product page that says this is a monochrome printer. It was inconvenient to send it back, but it is a fine enough product.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this printer.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this printer. It does everything. Print, scan, fax, copy etc. It is easy to use and will last forever. This is the second one that I have purchased because I needed a multifunction printer for my second office location.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Glory

customer_reviews.title: HP Laserjet Pro M1212nf is a winner
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior-performing, medium-sized, economical laser printer. Since I use it in a business environment B&W printing is sufficient, I don't need color. Printing quality and speed are excellent. It also has a scanner which is user-friendly and provides excellent scans. The one negative is that the automatic set-up function did not work for me. I had to use the installation disk, go into the directory and click on set-up and everything went fine from there. Great printer
customer_reviews.author: David P. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very good copier and scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Good alternative to ink-jets and does a good job of scanning. The top does not come off to do books, but otherwise it's very nice for the money. I get about 6-8 months on a laser cartridge, so it's cheaper than ink-jet printers. No color. If you need color printing and copying, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: D Cooper

customer_reviews.title: wish scanning was better
customer_reviews.text: There is a new touch screen model that is better. This is harder for a novice to scan from. you have to use the Scan feature on the CD provided or on software within your operating system,. not a good push button scan to feature available here.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Cooley

customer_reviews.title: laserjet
customer_reviews.text: We purchased HP LaserJet PRO M1212nf printer from Amazon about 1 yr ago. We just love it. We have found ourself in need for another printer.So of course we are getting another HP LaserJet PRO M1212nf printer. It prints fast,scan,copies and faxes. It is a great printer and not to large, so not to take up to much room.If I had one complaint it would be, that never seem to get the number of prints out of the toner cartridge it says we should.
customer_reviews.author: jsmorris

customer_reviews.title: Best reliable, cost effective laser printer
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have had. The first one which I had for 3 years, got hit by lightening. Love it. Very reliable and fast. Only drawback is that it is not wi-fi. When this one dies, I will look for an HP Laser Printer that is wi-fi.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Potter

customer_reviews.title: A Do everything Printer for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: A Do everything Printer for a Great Price, with HP quality. and tone available as compatible for excellent price, i am very happy with this purchase, and by the way: free ship came FedEX-fabulous: wholetoothmaui.com
customer_reviews.author: Ron W

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: THE PRINTER ARRIVE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION, AS DESCRIBED BY THE SELLER. I HAD NO PROBLEMS CONNECTING TO MI COMPUTER, BUT THE FAX OPERATION IS A BIT COMPLICATED. YOU HAVE TO DO MANY TESTS, SO YOU CAN OPERATE IT.
customer_reviews.author: PEPE MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: excellent printer
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble ordering and receiving this printer and actually put it together myself with a little help from a savvy friend. The quality and ease of copying is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kulkarni

customer_reviews.title: I like it but am having problems
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good buy and am happy with the printer. I bought it because I needed a scanner and am having problems at times with scanning. I keep getting error messages. I'll have to figure out why.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: great qualit in a small package
customer_reviews.text: great print quality in a small package, crisp, clear, and precise. The only negative for this unit is the small size of the toner cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: Smudlick

customer_reviews.title: this machine came in without fax function. We do ...
customer_reviews.text: this machine came in without fax function. We do not know how to contact the supplier and get how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GO FOR IT!
customer_reviews.text: NO KIDDING - I TEACH IN PUBLIC SCHOOL, AM A GRADUATE STUDENT, use constantly. a) INCREDIBLY FAST B) Saving a huge amount on ink and toner c) incredible PRICE! D) Scans and faxes efficiently
customer_reviews.author: Paliskate

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: FAST PRINTER I DONT NEED COLOR. CHEAP TONER. EASY TO SET UP. I WAS TOLD YOU CAN GET ABOUT 500 SHEETS TO A TONER CARTRAGE. I HOPE SO. GREAT PRINTER IM VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: PINEAPPLE AMERICA

customer_reviews.title: Mostly ok and a lot  of features for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and is all as advertised. The printing starts with very little delay unlike other laser printers. The only problem I had is with the answering machine with the fax set up share the phone line. The included software has a better setup than direct settings from the machine. I am generally pleased and it does all it supposed to a very economical price. I have not printed enough to rate the toner use.
customer_reviews.author: NC Jim

customer_reviews.title: GREAT printer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one - so reliable, easy to use, good on toner too!
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended seller
customer_reviews.text: excuse me my native language is Spanish I brought this machine to Venezuela a courier brought me excellent prints very fast, is small and very nice, get all complete without bumps'm very happy with the printer .... esta maquina me la traje a venezuela me la trajo un couriers es excelente imprime muy rapido, es pequeña y muy bonita, llego toda completa y sin golpes estoy muy contento con la impresora
customer_reviews.author: Adams Stangret

customer_reviews.title: Great for home and home office use
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job for home and home office use. If you scan a lot, this probably wouldn't work for you. Compared to my "big" one at work, this is slow. But happy I purchased this for home.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mcvay

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop printer
customer_reviews.text: These are great desktop printers. They are quiet, fast, and can connect via USB or a network cable. The new auto-install feature is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Reactions
customer_reviews.text: As a printer, I like it. As a scanner, the software does not seem to allow me to scan multiple pages and create one PDF from them.
customer_reviews.author: Karl G. Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: hp is a terrible company
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work and if you call for help you get people in India who dont know anything about the product and who couldnt care less about the customers
customer_reviews.author: just one guy talking

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: Liked my first one so much that I used at my office that I bought this one for my home office. Fast and toner lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's reliable but the number pad is not real easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My second HP printer is yet another disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Print quality was fine. Scanning was awkward, but it worked. But I got constant, cryptic error messages, so I would just keep hitting "OK" and it would eventually work. That was annoying, but I could live with it. But of course, just like my previous HP printer, it broke after 16 months of very light use. I never even got through a full toner cartridge before the mechanical parts of the printer just stopped working. After my previous experience with HP, I was foolish to buy another one. Never again. I now have a Brother printer which works great, and it costs less.
customer_reviews.author: K. in California

customer_reviews.title: Best Printer Ever
customer_reviews.text: I really like the HP Laser Jet Pro M1212nf Printer. Your recommendation fit exactly what I needed, and I was excited when I got it on time and eagerly set it up. This is a quiet printer and prints nicely, I also saved money on caterage refills, per your recommendation, Saved money and couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. It's cool to combine fax, copy, print and scan in one single machine at this low price. I'm happy to have it, it's a right decision!
customer_reviews.author: watermellon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any issues with this product so far. It is doing a good job printing out my work.
customer_reviews.author: corrina vernaza

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of the all in one printer and this is a great little machine for the money! Works very well with my iMac!
customer_reviews.author: Klent E. Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-Function machine
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our office and have been thrilled with them. No problems what so ever. The print quality is crisp and clean and would purchase them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: czworkout

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty good all-in-one and seems to be a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good all-in-one and seems to be a good purchase. In the future we would definitely buy another of the same model or model similar
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: A value item worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Scan, FAX, and Print with ease. Using an HP workstation and Win 7 with Adobe Acrobat Pro to handle the scanner. It is a little noisy and I have only used this for about 3-weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very easy install
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely as easy to install and said to be. Though it did not provide me with a USB cord I was able to use the CD to complete the installation. Printing looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Britt

customer_reviews.title: A bit loud
customer_reviews.text: Works like it is supposed to. Linux support lacks, needed a guru to make it work right. For windows users, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: thdrduck

customer_reviews.title: The product works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The product works as expected and I would recommend to all who would like to have an all-in-one B&W laser printer for personal use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Works good came with starter toner. Purchased for office use, we have a year older version very happy functions are very similar and easy to use and set up. Arrived just as shipping estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Pasco

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Number pad and Message Screen are very difficult to read. Machine is very difficult to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Works with Ubuntu!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to setup for Ubuntu 12.04 LTS via USB cable using HP's HPLIP from their site. The instructions were easy to follow. I've used the print, scan, and copy functions already.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Office Printer
customer_reviews.text: This multifunction device replaces an older HP LaserJet printer and flatbed scanner as well as an old Xerox WorkCentre copier. It is significantly faster than my older devices, and makes better quality copies and scans. The price was less than that for a toner cartridge for the Xerox WorkCenter. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell but so far so good. Hoping that the toner works out to the estimated .03cents per page vs. the .28 of ink per page. A little bit of a hiccup loading onto Mac but all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Gardnerville

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy as a scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently there is an issue with the scanning software with this all-in-one; any time I scan to a pdf the size of the document is 3'x4' and there doesn't seem to be any way to change this! I've had to download another scan-to-PDF program as a work around which is ridiculous. HP tech support just says to reinstall the drivers which does nothing.... too bad because the quality of the prints and ease of use otherwise is great.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: I got a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase, price was exceptionally good and it has met all my expectations. Shopping around paid off again
customer_reviews.author: Terry LaRochelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for an older laser printer and a copier. Installed quickly and all functions worked properly from the outset.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: fast service and excellent copier- only supplier that had this particular unit in stock -
customer_reviews.text: it is my understanding that this model is no longer being offered by the manufacturer - it is perfect for small professional office use
customer_reviews.author: dr f

customer_reviews.title: Good home all in one
customer_reviews.text: For light home use this printer is great. Quick to set up, easily networkable and good quality. The scanner is excellent and it's very helpful to have the copier as well. Highly recommend as a home printer.
customer_reviews.author: MRK

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the printer. This is my second one. My first one the kids set a pen on the paper feed and it got pulled in when printing and caused some damage, so watch out for anything be on the paper. I like the size, it's not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: great printer
customer_reviews.text: printer works great no issue does exactly what i needed it to do. use it for my home office and love the fact i can scan over the network
customer_reviews.author: mcneesecowboy

customer_reviews.title: Love this combo printer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the functionality of this printer. Very quiet, fast, and inexpensive to operate. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer and scanner combo
customer_reviews.text: Great Printer and scanner combo! Prints and scans perfectly over the network. My only complaint is that the display has no back light and can be very hard to read if there's an error.. If it had a small colored back lit screen it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D Money

customer_reviews.title: M1212nf Printer
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly fine for what i bought it to use for Works perfectly fine for what i bought it to use for
customer_reviews.author: Harlan G. Isom

customer_reviews.title: I have
customer_reviews.text: a similar one and love it. Works great. This was bought as a christmas present for my son and his wife. I haven't heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gannett

customer_reviews.title: Personal opinion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer for my personal use due to all the "functions in one" advertisement but I was really amazed at the speed of the printer in all the functions. Although it is larger than my last HP printer it certainly is very compact and easy to connect. So far so good, I like the product and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: joande

customer_reviews.title: Great item. No problems so far
customer_reviews.text: Great item. No problems so far. I had one previously and bought this for my sons.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bouwhuis

customer_reviews.title: Solid little printer! Very simple, but very fast.
customer_reviews.text: Impressively fast. Network setup was easy on a mac. PC setup was a ten minute process. So far, very happy with it's performance!
customer_reviews.author: tunahammer

customer_reviews.title: HP 1212
customer_reviews.text: Nice printer and performs with all the functions we require. Purchased HP before and like the product. The only concern I would have is that there isn't a cover for the paper. It is used in an office setting with a high volume of printing and this machine is great.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Solid laser quality multi-function device.
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you only need black and white. The only thing I wish is that it printed color.
customer_reviews.author: markfromit

customer_reviews.title: it showed up without the exit tray extension which I ...
customer_reviews.text: it showed up without the exit tray extension which I had to buy at about $30.00. there was no printer cable, but that was not a surprise
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Black and white copier, fax, scanner and it does not take a lot of effort to install. Totally wireless and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Terrific basic laserjet printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer. Fast, feeders work correctly, I can't imagine that I hand-fed my old laserjet for so long. Highly recommend this for basic laser printing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: too bad
customer_reviews.text: Printing function was ok, but the copy and scan function didn't work. Something was wrong with the scaning, too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Yukij

customer_reviews.text: I really like the speed that the product produces. I can print almost anything I want in the shortest span of time. The only problem I have with this product is that there is no color when I want to print pictures.
customer_reviews.author: VeraErwin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality printer, but not super fast.
customer_reviews.text: Prints very well, hope it holds up to everyday personal business use. Quality is good, it's just not super fast.
customer_reviews.author: M CoxPBC

customer_reviews.title: All we wanted at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The multipurpose printer was easy to set up and is performing great. I recommend it for a limited use item.
customer_reviews.author: cmatcc

customer_reviews.title: Almost 300 page product manual on disc
customer_reviews.text: Had no idea for a week that the product manual is not printed. This was a huge disappointment and detriment for me. Having printed almost 300 pages to keep on hand for an understanding of this complex product, I see that it is very poorly organized... writing strictly for me. And the communication links for human contact at the HP website are most unreliable. Always sending me in dead-end circles trying to achieve ANY level of customer service. In fact, I've come to view it as well planned avoidance behavior on the part of HP.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: need more instructions
customer_reviews.text: This unit needs more instructions to know how to operate every aspect of the printer. Easy to adapt to my computer, but after that LOST!
customer_reviews.author: tom/

customer_reviews.title: cheap piece ever.
customer_reviews.text: doesn't meet the price and expectations. it supposed to be about $60. don't buy, it would be waste of money
customer_reviews.author: maiko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, for house and small business
customer_reviews.text: it help me a lot. have everything what you need. what I don't like is that you cannot clean from dust the upper tray
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Oprea

customer_reviews.title: Difficuly loading cartrider
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to load ink cartridge, door simply will not close I am attempting to return this product with little succes so far.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bakos

customer_reviews.title: Tried 2- Bought a Brother
customer_reviews.text: My old printer was an HP & would not recognize Windows 7. So I purchsed an HP m1212nf. My office was w/o a printer for a week while we want thru hours of Tech Assist & driver downloads attempting to fix it. Not possible. HP sent a new one. Worked for 1 week. Not repairable. Shipped it back to HP for a refund. Purchased a Brother MFC - 7840W. Love it! NO Mas Hp!
customer_reviews.author: Capt DK

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless
customer_reviews.text: No fault of HP, but Amazon has this grouped on its website with wireless printers. I just received it today and it probably works just fine - however I quickly realized while unpacking that it was not wireless technology. HP makes no claims that this is a wireless printer - it is a mistake on the Amazon site. Hopefully, this review might help someone from making the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: B. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: NO USB cable? I didn`t know hp is that stingy!
customer_reviews.text: I got the printer today and I can not tell you about the quality of this machine yet. Stupid hp won`t put the USB cable and that is the key part for installation!
customer_reviews.author: negin

product_meta.title: HP LaserJet Pro M1212nf  Printer (CE841A#BGJ),BLK
product_meta.description:
HP LaserJet Pro M1212nf MFP Printer

FROM THE MANUFACTURER

WHY BUY?




FUNCTIONS




FEATURES






SPECIFICATIONS





REMEMBER ORIGINAL HP TONER AND PAPER





SAVE with X cartridges and combo packs








WHICH HP PRINTER IS RIGHT FOR YOU? 




Compare the good, better and best, side by side







 1. HP Smart Install works with Windows only.
 2. HP Auto-On and Auto-Off capabilities subject to printer and settings.
 3. Exact speed varies depending on system configuration, software application, driver, and document complexity.
 4. Based on ISO/IEC 19752 and continuous printing. Actual yields vary considerably based on images printed and other factors. For details see www.hp.com/go/learnaboutsupplies.
feature_bullets: Hi-Speed USB 2.0 port, 10/100Base-T Ethernet network port, RJ-11
